title: Best Bits of the Year with Morgan & Special Guest Eddie!
itunes:title: Best Bits of the Year with Morgan & Special Guest Eddie!
description:
Merry Christmas!! Whenever Eddie comes on Best Bits, Morgan and Eddie always takes us through happy, exciting, and serious conversations. For this podcast they broke down the entire 2021 year with every up and down they faced personally, as well as discussed the show’s best moments. Morgan and Eddie have a lot to share as they look back on the entire year and remember everything that happened.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
